con:soapui-project.name: GW-406/949

con:testSuite.name: GW-406/949
con:testSuite.con:description:
This tests Gateway-406 (GW-949 is the testing subtask). See ticket for more details.
There are two things to test: 1.If the requesting gateway encountered an error before the PD request is sent to the NwHIN (the error is local), then the gateway was not correctly populating the sender and receiver\ device\id\@root. Now, the fields are populated with the actual gateway HCID.
2. Error information is now populated in the XML tag controlActProcess\reasonOf\ detectedIssueEvent\text.
